concepts.definition: A natural number greater than 1 that has no positive divisors other than 1 and itself

variations.text: 2 is the only even prime number

concepts.definition: A number that represents a part of a whole, written as one number over another

variations.text: 1/2 means one half, 3/4 means three quarters
The top number is the numerator, the bottom is the denominator

concepts.definition: The distance around the outside of a shape

variations.text: The perimeter of a square with side 4 is 16
Add up all the side lengths to find perimeter

concepts.definition: A symbol (usually a letter) that represents an unknown number in mathematics

variations.text: In the equation x + 5 = 10, x is a variable
Variables allow us to write general mathematical relationships

concepts.definition: A way of expressing a number as a fraction of 100

variations.text: To convert a decimal to percentage, multiply by 100
